alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dorchester County through 915 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taylors Island, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Hurlock, Secretary, Vienna, University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, East New Market, Church Creek, Brookview, Eldorado, Madison, Lloyds, Taylors Island, Woolford, Bucktown and Linkwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
